attributes.background:
Care homes are allowed to charge excessive prices for care to the elderly. After paying £31,000 for care the care home has now sent a letter increasing the cost of care by £98 per week. No
difference in care and no assesment, this needs urgently looking into as care homes can charge what they want.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.  

If you want the Government or Parliament to introduce a new law that limits the amount that care homes can charge, you could start a new petition calling on the Government and Parliament to do that.
